title: Garen and Mundo's current state
body:
{{champion:86}} I would accept reducing his resistances for a way for him to do more damage. Right now he's very very hard to kill.
W - extends duration of his spin, while reducing damage. Removed armor / magic resistance gain.

{{champion:36}} I would accept a weaker ult, for a stronger passive.
Ultimate healing reduced, movement speed increase. Passive now heals more.
